thread.title_full: Perth woman sent penis shirt by LGFG Fashion House | Daily Mail Online

author: Kate Darvall For Daily Mail Australia
title: Perth woman sent penis shirt by LGFG Fashion House | Daily Mail Online
text: 'Bullying' lawyer outraged her $2,000 designer suit did not fit is even less impressed when company sent her a shirt covered in lewd print as part of a settlement deal Woman sent a shirt emblazoned with male genitalia by angry tailoring company The shirt was personally delivered to Perth lawyer Francesca Bucolo on Friday Ms Bucolo had sued LGFG Fashion House over a poorly altered $2000 work suit She was forced to send it back eight times, before finally taking legal action The alteration company president has admitted to sending the explicit t-shirt Published: 03:26 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 10:39 GMT, 14 February 2017 47 shares
